feed.title: Specifically Clementines Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Specifically Clementines: v1.1.2 - Bug fixes for new installations
entry.content:
• Fix issue where DB would not be created on first run/execution
  • Fix issue with conflicts view name not being correct on new creation

Google Play Store Link: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=net.shaytech.groceries

entry.title: New release for Specifically Clementines: v1.1.3 - Bug fixes, dependency updates, docs
entry.content:
• Update new dependencies
  • Change to Vite rather than create-react-app
  • Change core logging framework -- will later enable better mobile app logging support
  • Change docs - update links, explain LOG_DEBUG environment variables
  • Change docker-compose.yaml in "full" example to use "latest" tag as a default

entry.title: New release for Specifically Clementines: v1.1.4 - Fix Category Add Bug
entry.content:
• When adding a new category from category screen, ensure category is added/enabled on all lists in the list group
  • Use same logic when adding a category with the "quick popup/plus sign" on the item screen
  • Update to latest dependencies on client and server

entry.title: New release for Specifically Clementines: v1.1.6 - Update to Ionic 8, various UI fixes/enhancements
entry.content:
• Updated to Ionic 8.0 and latest version of all libs/dependencies
  • Added light/dark mode setting in addition to following system setting
  • Allow enter key on login in browser to perform login without hitting login button
  • Make whole grocery list/listgroup name clickable (height and width)
  • Make entire item name clickable (width/height)
  • Cleaned up menu structure by adding new "Manage Data" section for lesser-used features
  • Changed settings page by splitting into status, user info, and actual settings. Added documentation link to settings page.
  • Fixed some reported list/list group bugs when in "Don't Add to All Lists Automatically" mode
  • Fixed drag/drop category order editor bug on list editor

entry.title: New release for Specifically Clementines: v1.1.7 - Update dependencies, API 36 support for Android, bug fixes
entry.content:
• CSS Styling for backend forms (new account, password reset)
  • Fix security issue in password reset process
  • Content security policy fixes
  • Frontend web server correctly loading env-config.js to default DEFAULT_API_URL

Please note, due to some underlying issues in Capacitor and Ionic, I am unable to support anything earlier than API level 33 (Android 13). Android 13 will work, however.

If you are using anything earlier, I would advise not updating.
